data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Mewat, Haryana, India that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mewat, Haryana, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, make the 3,433 believers in Mewat to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 308,667 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Mewat, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Mewat, Haryana, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Brahmin Haryana people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Brahmin Haryana people.
Jesus, help the church in the county of Mewat to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Mewat, Haryana, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 312,100 people living in Mewat.
